mapper.select: SELECT CR_NO FROM ( SELECT R.CR_NO FROM CHATROOM R, CHATMEMBER M WHERE M.EMP_NO = #{empNo} ORDER BY CR_NO DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1

SELECT CR_NO FROM chatMember WHERE EMP_NO IN (#{myNo}, #{empNo}) GROUP BY CR_NO HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT EMP_NO) = 2 AND CR_NO NOT IN ( SELECT CR_NO FROM chatMember WHERE EMP_NO NOT IN (#{myNo}, #{empNo}) )
SELECT MAX(TO_NUMBER(CR_NO)) FROM CHATROOM
SELECT CHAT_NO FROM ( SELECT CHAT_NO FROM CHAT WHERE CR_NO = #{crNo} ORDER BY CHAT_NO DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT CR_NO FROM CHATMEMBER WHERE EMP_NO = #{chatuser} OR EMP_NO =#{empNo} GROUP BY CR_NO HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT EMP_NO) = 2
SELECT CR_NO FROM chatmember WHERE EMP_NO = #{empNo}
select emp_no from chatmember where cr_no = #{crNo}
SELECT E.EMP_NO, E.EMP_NAME, E.EMP_PHOTO, D.DEPT_NAME FROM EMP E LEFT JOIN DEPT D ON E.DEPT_CD = D.DEPT_CD WHERE E.EMP_NO != #{empNo}

SELECT C.CR_NO, MAX(CM.CRCM_TITLE) AS CRCM_TITLE, (SELECT CH1.CHAT_MSG FROM CHAT CH1 WHERE CH1.CR_NO = C.CR_NO AND CH1.CHAT_NO = (SELECT MAX(CH1.CHAT_NO) FROM CHAT CH1 WHERE CH1.CR_NO = C.CR_NO)) AS CHAT_MSG, (SELECT MAX(CH1.CHAT_NO) FROM CHAT CH1 WHERE CH1.CR_NO = C.CR_NO) AS CHAT_NO, (SELECT CH1.CHAT_DATE FROM CHAT CH1 WHERE CH1.CR_NO = C.CR_NO AND CH1.CHAT_NO = (SELECT MAX(CH1.CHAT_NO) FROM CHAT CH1 WHERE CH1.CR_NO = C.CR_NO)) AS CHAT_DATE, (SELECT CH1.CHASENDER_EMPNO FROM CHAT CH1 WHERE CH1.CR_NO = C.CR_NO AND CH1.CHAT_NO = (SELECT MAX(CH1.CHAT_NO) FROM CHAT CH1 WHERE CH1.CR_NO = C.CR_NO)) AS CHASENDER_EMPNO FROM CHATROOM C JOIN CHATMEMBER CM ON C.CR_NO = CM.CR_NO WHERE CM.EMP_NO = #{empNo} GROUP BY C.CR_NO ORDER BY CHAT_NO DESC
SELECT EMP_NAME FROM EMP WHERE EMP_NO IN ( SELECT EMP_NO FROM CHATMEMBER WHERE CR_NO = #{crNo} )

SELECT C.CHAT_NO, C.CHAT_DATE, C.CHAT_MSG, C.CHASENDER_EMPNO, C.CHAT_UNCHECK, C.CR_NO, CM.EMP_PHOTO FROM CHAT C LEFT JOIN EMP CM ON C.CHASENDER_EMPNO = CM.EMP_NO WHERE C.CR_NO = #{crNo} ORDER BY C.CHAT_NO ASC
SELECT emp_no , cr_no , cc_first , cc_end , cm_status , crcm_title FROM chatmember where emp_no = #{empNo}
SELECT max(chat_no) as chat_no, chat_uncheck, cr_no, CHASENDER_EMPNO FROM chat where cr_no = #{crNo} GROUP BY cr_no, chat_uncheck, CHASENDER_EMPNO ORDER BY 1 DESC
